about_the_game: This pack unlocks 1,000 Warpstone, the virtual currency you can spend in Blood Bowl 3. You can use it to buy multiple elements, such as the Blood Pass and customization items.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood Bowl 3 features Fantasy Violence and Blood.

detailed_description: This pack unlocks 1,000 Warpstone, the virtual currency you can spend in Blood Bowl 3. You can use it to buy multiple elements, such as the Blood Pass and customization items.
legal_notice: Blood Bowl 3 © Copyright Games Workshop Limited 2020. name: Blood Bowl 3 -  1000 Warpstone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7770, 1 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 4 GB | AMD Radeon RX 570, 4 GB

short_description: This pack unlocks 1,000 Warpstone, the virtual currency you can spend in Blood Bowl 3. You can use it to buy multiple elements, such as the Blood Pass and customization items.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
